hompageDescriptive: The Marble site is a collaboration between the Hesburgh Libraries and the Snite Museum of Art at the University of Notre Dame. In this unified discovery space, users have free, public access to a selection of digitized, distinctive cultural heritage materials. This platform facilitates cross-institutional browsing and serendipitous discovery of materials from the Snite Museum of Art, Rare Books & Special Collections, and the University Archives. Learn more about this project.
